resources.string: A reboot is required to apply the settings.
Offline voice recognition will not be forced if this is checked.
Disable to hide the icon of this app in your launcher.
Blacklisted apps won\'t be affected by this module.
Keyboards use voice typing instead of voice recognition. The blacklist won\'t affect them. Use this setting instead.
To remove an app from the blacklist, tap on the app.\n\nTo add, tap on ADD and find the app.
